Hey there

Nice to meet you!

Hi, I'm Marie-Lene. I'm a people and music lover based in Hamburg, Germany.

Doing a long distance hiking trip has long been on my bucket list. I had discovered the Via Dinarica by coincidence in the spring of 2020 and was both intimidated and intrigued by it. When I decided to take a Sabbatical one year later, it was the perfect opportunity to tackle it. I'm so glad I dared to take the first step!
